description:
The new video that is becoming an instant viral sensation is from the young singer Alison Gold and her music video for “Chinese Food”!来自年轻歌手Alison Gold的最新音乐录音带《中国菜》日前成了最新的网络热点。

“I love Chinese food/You know that it’s true/I love fried rice, I love noodles/I love chow mein, chow mo-mo-mo-mo-mein,” Alison sings on the track.我们可以听到Alison这样唱道：“我爱中国/你知道它的真实/我爱炒/我爱大米、面条、我爱州城主町-Mo-Mo-Mo-Mo-主”（小编注：原视频上标注的汉语歌词）

Alison is already getting comparisons to the infamous Rebecca Black and her video for “Friday.” The comparisons are coming in correctly as the videos were produced by the same person – Patrice Wilson of the Ark Music Factory.Alison Gold的这首歌曲已经被拿来和Rebecca Black之前那首很著名的神曲《星期五》作比较，因为这两首歌都是出自同一人之手：制作人都是来自方舟音乐工厂的Patrice Wilson。

WHAT DO YOU THINK of Alison Gold’s song “Chinese Food”?你觉得Alison Gold的这首《中国菜》怎么样？

英文歌词：

After balling I go clubbing
Then I’m hugging
Then I’m hungry and I’m walking on the street
and I’m getting getting getting getting grumpy grumpy

I see Chow, by my right
I smell food in the air
It’s Chinese Food, my favorite
So I’m getting getting getting getting hungry
